title: President approves 90-day remission in jail terms on Eid
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 6 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Thursday approved remission in jail terms for the convicts on the occasion of Eid-ul-Fitr.
The president approved reduction of 90 days in the jail terms of those convicted for different crimes, according to a President House statement.
However, the remission would not be applicable on those involved in the heinous crimes.
